actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 102-265.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 431.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A bill to authorize extensions of time limitations in a FERC-issued license.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon a certain licensee's request, to extend for a specified period the time required for the licensee to acquire the requisite real property and commence construction of a specified project, as well as the time required for its completion. Terminates such authorization on a certain date.

titles.title: A bill to authorize extensions of time limitations in a FERC-issued license.
